summary_text: IIT Bombay graduate with a strong foundation in Computer Science and Engineering. Demonstrated excellence in academic projects and competitive programming. Seeking a challenging role to leverage analytical skills and drive technological innovation.

seo_title: IIT Bombay Resume Format for Freshers (2026) | Free Builder
meta_description: Create a professional resume for IIT Bombay placements. Free ATS-friendly builder. Highlight CPI, Internships, and PORs. Build instantly.
keywords: resume format for iit bombay computer science

faqs.q: Should I include my JEE Rank?
faqs.a: Only if it was exceptional (Top 100) or if you are a fresher applying for your first internship. For full-time roles, focus on your CPI and projects.

faqs.q: How do I highlight my PORs (Positions of Responsibility)?
faqs.a: Use a dedicated 'Leadership' or 'POR' section. Quantify your impact, e.g., 'Managed a budget of ₹50L for Mood Indigo'.

industry_context: IIT Bombay placements are highly competitive. Recruiters look for high CPI (8+), strong internships, and leadership roles in student bodies.
ats_tips: Mention 'IIT Bombay' or 'US Institute of Technology Bombay' clearly

faqs.q: How do I list Practice School (PS)?
faqs.a: List PS-I and PS-II under 'Work Experience' or 'Internships'. Clearly mention the company name and the duration (e.g., '6 Months').

industry_context: BITS Pilani's PS system gives students significant industry exposure (almost 1 year) before graduation. This is a major USP.
